tool_description: PhoneLabo API is an API that provides phones informations ( specifications ) where you can find almost every detail about a phone . the API includes over 1200 phone ( almost every phone released on the last 10 years from global / big companies )
name: PhoneLabo
title: PhoneLabo

api_list.name: matchDevices
api_list.description: takes a string and matches the devices starting with with that using the help of Regex ( matches and retrunes the devices by realease date order )

optional_parameters.name: imageOnly
optional_parameters.description: decides if the request includes all the device data including  its image or just the image  itself.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: how many devices you want to match ( default 5 )

api_list.name: getLatest

optional_parameters.name: imageOnly
optional_parameters.description: decides if the request includes all the device data including  its image or just the image  itself.

api_list.name: getUpcomingDevices
api_list.description: get upcoming phones ( revealed but not released yet , also rumoured phones from stronger resources )

optional_parameters.name: imageOnly
optional_parameters.description: decides if the request includes all the device data including  its image or just the image  itself.

api_list.name: getDevice
api_list.description: returnes all the device data including its image URL

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: specify the name of the device , the following formats are accepted  :  'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max' , apple -iPhone-11-pro -max

optional_parameters.name: imageOnly
optional_parameters.description: decides if the request includes all the device data including  its image or just the image  itself.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: fetches the desired version of the device ( almost every phone has a Global version in our system but not many has regional versions we recommend fetching the phone to get its versions then make another request using one version of the available ones.
